Method Detail

act

public void act()
Act - do whatever the Character wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

setAttackDamage

public void setAttackDamage(double attackBonus)
Sets the attack of a character based upon the input of an attackBonus.

Parameters:
double - attackBonus - The bonus that will be used to increase the character's attack.

setDamageTaken

public void setDamageTaken(double damageIn,
                           double defense)
Removes health from the character based on the damage from another character's attack value and the amount of defense this character has.

Parameters:
double - damageIn The damage that the character will be taking.
double - defense The amount of defense this character has.

setDefense

public void setDefense(double defenseBonus)
Sets the defense of a character based upon the input of a defenseBonus

Parameters:
double - defenseBonus - The bonus that will be used to increase the character's defense.

setHealth

public void setHealth(double healthBonus)
Sets the health of the character based upon the input of a health bonus.

Parameters:
double - healthBonus The amount of health that is to be added to the players original health.

setSpeed

public void setSpeed(double speedBonus)
Sets the speed of a character based upon the input of a speedBonus

Parameters:
double - speedBonus - The bonus that will be used to increase the character's speed.
